content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I have your name please?
Nice to meet you, Helen. Could you please provide the address where you need plumbing service?
Thanks, Helen. Let me check if 123 Maple St is within our service area.
Great news! Your address is within our service area. What time would be ideal for our plumber to visit?
Tomorrow afternoon would work for me.
Checking our calendar for availability tomorrow afternoon...
We have openings tomorrow afternoon. I will now attempt to book your appointment with our plumber.
Apologies, Helen, I encountered a technical issue while booking your appointment. Let me request human assistance to resolve this promptly.
reason: Booking system error, AI unable to complete booking
